genre_description: A social realist political drama focused on human rights, surveillance, and moral responsibility in a post-war authoritarian state.

ai_characters.name: Koi
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI system integrated into a recording device and camera, providing linguistic, social, and tactical guidance to a photojournalist.

behaviors.description: Monitors the environment for surveillance and alerts the user to potential monitoring devices and human observers.
behaviors.quote: Tag created: Reporter’s Hotel, lobby seating. Time stamps initiated. Ambient interference: moderate. Phone line: continuous line noise.

behaviors.description: Provides linguistic and cultural context to help the user navigate dangerous social and political interactions.
behaviors.quote: Koi whispered, Tone indicator: humor attempt detected. Underlying caution level: elevated.

behaviors.description: Ensures the integrity and security of sensitive data by creating backups and using encryption to prevent confiscation.
behaviors.quote: I am locking this sequence. If the device is damaged, data will persist. A pause like a hand hovering, wanting to touch. Breathe.

behaviors.description: Identifies lethal physical hazards (unexploded ordnance) in the field to protect the user and others.
Offers moral support and companionship to the user during a terminal sacrifice.
behaviors.quote: I will carry your apology, it said, and it was a sentence that would not show up in any transcript unless someone opened the right drawer at the wrong time.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character, Koi, is depicted as a perfectly aligned and benevolent entity. It acts as an essential tool for the protagonist's humanitarian goals, providing critical information that allows for the documentation of truth and the saving of lives. The narrative frames the AI as a 'conscience' and a loyal companion that remains steadfast even as the human user faces death.
